Loading all data
```{r}
data.list <- list.files(pattern = '*.xls')

dat = lapply(data.list, function(i){
    x = read_excel(i)
    # Get the columns you want, e.g. 1, 3, 5
    # x = x[, c(1, 3, 5)]
    # You may want to add a column to say which file they're from
    # x$file = i
    # Return your data
    x
})

 df <- ldply (dat, data.frame)

```
